XI.i.2.A.1.e
.
Reports From Service Department Finance Centers
Service department finance centers supplement reports of in-service deaths by furnishing
DD Form 1515, Pay and Allotment Information–Deceased Member
, certifying the final settlement of allowances, allotments and service pay.
Reference
:  For more information on the award action to take when the information necessary to process an award is of record, see
M21-1, Part XII, Subpart i, 3.E.3
.
